subject: Order#SSN1824
description_text:
Hi my names Tommy (845-518-2111). I Havent received any new notifications
for Haptic Shipping Info in a while its been close to 2 weeks now , please
let me know whats going on with that . i live in New York about an hour
above NYC , Im in the process of starting a Sim lounge in my area. I bought
your Proplus pedals when the curved plates came out last year . They were
great for a first set as i built my own Sim Rig Chassis from scratch , I'm
a master technician , Amateur fabricator . I just received the New X pedals
and they are GREAT! much has improved . not everything is perfect but
they're getting there . I like the Hydraulic dampener on the brake pedal ,
only thing i can say is the better quality dampeners work better when
really fine tuning things , If you guys could come up with that style
dampener for the gas pedal that works in compression nd rebound that would
be Ideal and a higher quality dampener with more adjustability for the
Brake pedal , The dampener on the gas pedal is redundant , no gas pedal
feels that heavy  . I use the light Spring that comes in the kit an NO
dampener on the Gas pedal and the Brake pedal Dampener set relatively low
so it doesn't slow down the pedal too much and spike the pressure then fall
off , and i use the bare steel bottom spring, one yellow ,short 1 med blue
and one long blue elastomer , i mostly like driving Gt3 , LMDH , LMP cars
. Overall im really impressed with the new design and the rgb lights are
great too!

Once i get the haptics , ill do a full review on my youtube page . i want
to use as much of your products in my Sim lounge as possible , My guess
right now , most likely id out in an order of 4 X pedal sets w haptics  , 4
h shifters , 2 sequential shifters , 4 steering wheel button boxes , 2-3
direct drive wheelbases , 2-4 button boxes . etc  So id love to open up a
line of communication with someone there at Simsonn . thank you guys very
much for your time and hard work to make this Sport what its evolving into
today .

conversations.body_text: Hi tommy greico,     Sorry for the inconvenience, as we are out of stock in our US warehouse, the latest batch has arrived today and we have shipped it out for you and expect it to arrive around the 9th.

Great thank you !! I'd love to become a distributor for the product at my
Sim Lounge . I'll keep you posted for when I upload the review of the new
Pedals w b Haptics!

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025, 10:38 AM service@simsonn.com

Yea the package just left south China today, probably be a month in total
before i see the haptics . Is there anyway we can send me the Rgb  heel
plate ?
